title: German food logo
content:

comments.content:
It appears to be a really tasteless mixture of Le Griffe and Le Griffe Swash...  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/le-griffe-2/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017144020/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/le-griffe-2/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/le-griffe-2/")

Schneider is the German word for tailor. So we can say the sign was stitched together :)  
Don
